title: Asteroids - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/12/20
itunes:title: Asteroids - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/12/20
description:
George Noory and author Mike McCoy explore his research into near Earth asteroids, the odds that Earth could be hit by a massive asteroid and cause devastating destruction, and how humanity can protect itself and survive.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
